nars.gui

Class InferenceRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.gui.InferenceRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInferenceRecorder

    public class InferenceRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInferenceRecorder
    Inference log, which record input/output of each inference step interface with 1 implementation: GUI ( batch not implemented )
